name: T'landa Til Charlatan
description: Originally hailing from Varl, t’landa Til are massive sentient quadrupeds distantly related to the Hutts. Til possess thick, trunk­ like legs, a thin whip of a tail, and two slen­der arms. The t ’landa Til are not as wealthy or powerful as the Hutts, and many of them serve the Hutts in various capacities.
